Title: The Final Front
Description:
Just before the kobyss attacked, we received word of a disturbance near Livia's Patience. Now we know the cause.

We... Light... We can't survive fighting on two fronts, $n. We have to stop this, now.
ObjectivesText: Travel to Light's Redoubt in Hallowfall.
RewardText:
Flames, they tunnelled up through the lake bed.

Livia's Patience has already fallen.
